data.name: A
data.title: Shrimp and Chorizo Paella
data.content: This impressive paella is a perfect party dish and a fun meal to cook together with your guests. Add 1 cup of frozen peas along with the mussels, if you like.

data.name: P
data.title: Chicken Alfredo
data.content: Creamy chicken Alfredo pasta for a delightful dinner. Cook fettuccine according to package instructions. In a large skillet, melt butter and add garlic. Cook until fragrant.

data.name: D
data.title: Vegetarian Stir-Fry
data.content: Healthy and colorful vegetable stir-fry. A quick and tasty way to get your veggies in. Use your favorite vegetables and tofu or tempeh for a vegetarian option.

data.name: Q
data.title: Mango Salsa Chicken
data.content: A tropical twist on classic grilled chicken. Juicy mango salsa adds sweetness and flavor to perfectly cooked chicken breasts. Great for summer barbecues.

data.name: Y
data.title: Caprese Salad
data.content: Classic Caprese salad with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil. Drizzle with balsamic glaze for a simple and elegant appetizer.

data.name: U
data.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
data.content: Hearty and flavorful spaghetti Bolognese. Ground beef cooked in a rich tomato sauce, served over al dente spaghetti. Comfort food at its best.

data.name: V
data.title: Avocado Toast
data.content: Simple and satisfying avocado toast. Creamy mashed avocado on toasted bread with a sprinkle of salt and red pepper flakes. Perfect for a quick and healthy breakfast.

data.name: J
data.title: Teriyaki Salmon
data.content: Flaky and flavorful teriyaki-glazed salmon. A delicious and healthy seafood dish that's easy to prepare. Serve with steamed rice and vegetables.

data.name: M
data.title: Caesar Salad
data.content: Classic Caesar salad with crisp romaine lettuce, garlic croutons, and parmesan cheese. Tossed in a creamy Caesar dressing for a refreshing side or light meal.

data.name: S
data.title: Margherita Pizza
data.content: Classic Margherita pizza with fresh tomato slices, mozzarella cheese, and basil leaves. Baked to perfection for a simple yet delicious homemade pizza.
